sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the College Planning Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the College Planning Act.

sections.heading: College Planning Program; establishment. The College Planning Program is established to do all of the following:
sections.text: College Planning Program; establishment. The College Planning Program is established to do all of the following:

sections.heading: Qualifications to participate in the Program. To qualify to participate in the Program, a student must meet all of the following requirements:
sections.text: Qualifications to participate in the Program. To qualify to participate in the Program, a student must meet all of the following requirements:

sections.heading: Program benefits. Subject to appropriation of State, federal, or private funds, the Commission shall deliver the following services and benefits to students enrolled in the Program:
sections.text: Program benefits. Subject to appropriation of State, federal, or private funds, the Commission shall deliver the following services and benefits to students enrolled in the Program:

sections.heading: Program disqualification. If a program participant fails to meet the requirements for continuation in the Program, the student is disqualified from future receipt of Program services and benefits that are not available to all students in this State
sections.text: Program disqualification. If a program participant fails to meet the requirements for continuation in the Program, the student is disqualified from future receipt of Program services and benefits that are not available to all students in this State.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
